title: Dovetail a drawer
brief_description: Explains everything from cutting the stock to size, running the groove for the drawer bottom, to cutting the dovetails and glueing up and fitting the drawer. Shows how to use a hacksaw, a chisel, and a smoothing plane with new confidence, how to rip, crosscut and plow on power machinery, how to organise the whole drawer making process from layout to finishing touches.
